Our system automates review requests, making it easier for your patients to share their experiences."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"What platforms do you manage for reviews?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"We specialize in managing your reviews on key platforms like Google, Facebook, and Yelp, which are the most important for both prospective patients and search engines."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"How do you handle negative reviews?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"We monitor reviews continuously and respond to negative feedback quickly.
